body_html:
Does anyone solve this?
I use cent os 6.x and it's glibc version is under the 2.12.

(tensorflow)[dev-srv /home/user/tensorflow]# yum info glibc
Loaded plugins: fastestmirror, security
Determining fastest mirrors
Installed Packages
Name        : glibc
Arch        : i686
Version     : 2.12

I download glibc-2.17-78.el7.x86_64.rpm in the Internet and uncompress rpm to /opt/tensorflow/glibc diretory.

(tensorflow)[dev-srv /home/user/tensorflow]# ls /opt/tensorflow/glibc/lib64/
ld-2.17.so               libanl-2.17.so   libcidn.so.1      libm-2.17.so           libnss_compat.so.2  libnss_files-2.17.so   libnss_nis.so.2         libresolv-2.17.so    libthread_db.so.1
ld-linux-x86-64.so.2     libanl.so.1      libcrypt-2.17.so  libm.so.6              libnss_db-2.17.so   libnss_files.so.2      libnss_nisplus-2.17.so  libresolv.so.2       libutil-2.17.so
libBrokenLocale-2.17.so  libc-2.17.so     libcrypt.so.1     libnsl-2.17.so         libnss_db.so.2      libnss_hesiod-2.17.so  libnss_nisplus.so.2     librt-2.17.so        libutil.so.1
libBrokenLocale.so.1     libc.so.6        libdl-2.17.so     libnsl.so.1            libnss_dns-2.17.so  libnss_hesiod.so.2     libpthread-2.17.so      librt.so.1           rtkaio
libSegFault.so           libcidn-2.17.so  libdl.so.2        libnss_compat-2.17.so  libnss_dns.so.2     libnss_nis-2.17.so     libpthread.so.0         libthread_db-1.0.so

Finally, I ran convolutional.py with LD_PRELOAD or LD_LIBRARY_PATH option and those neither helpful. Here is an error message.

(tensorflow)[dev-srv /home/user/tensorflow]# LD_PRELOAD=/opt/tensorflow/glibc/lib64/libc.so.6 python ./lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/models/image/mnist/convolutional.py
python: relocation error: /opt/tensorflow/glibc/lib64/libc.so.6: symbol _dl_starting_up, version GLIBC_PRIVATE not defined in file ld-linux-x86-64.so.2 with link time reference

(tensorflow)[dev-srv /home/user/tensorflow]# LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/opt/tensorflow/glibc/lib64 python ./lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/models/image/mnist/convolutional.py
python: relocation error: /opt/tensorflow/glibc/lib64/libc.so.6: symbol _dl_starting_up, version GLIBC_PRIVATE not defined in file ld-linux-x86-64.so.2 with link time reference

Does anyone really solve this issue without upgrading OS?

body:
Does anyone solve this?
I use cent os 6.x and it's glibc version is under the 2.12.

```
(tensorflow)[dev-srv /home/user/tensorflow]# yum info glibc
Loaded plugins: fastestmirror, security
Determining fastest mirrors
Installed Packages
Name        : glibc
Arch        : i686
Version     : 2.12
```

I download glibc-2.17-78.el7.x86_64.rpm in the Internet and uncompress rpm to /opt/tensorflow/glibc diretory.

```
(tensorflow)[dev-srv /home/user/tensorflow]# ls /opt/tensorflow/glibc/lib64/
ld-2.17.so               libanl-2.17.so   libcidn.so.1      libm-2.17.so           libnss_compat.so.2  libnss_files-2.17.so   libnss_nis.so.2         libresolv-2.17.so    libthread_db.so.1
ld-linux-x86-64.so.2     libanl.so.1      libcrypt-2.17.so  libm.so.6              libnss_db-2.17.so   libnss_files.so.2      libnss_nisplus-2.17.so  libresolv.so.2       libutil-2.17.so
libBrokenLocale-2.17.so  libc-2.17.so     libcrypt.so.1     libnsl-2.17.so         libnss_db.so.2      libnss_hesiod-2.17.so  libnss_nisplus.so.2     librt-2.17.so        libutil.so.1
libBrokenLocale.so.1     libc.so.6        libdl-2.17.so     libnsl.so.1            libnss_dns-2.17.so  libnss_hesiod.so.2     libpthread-2.17.so      librt.so.1           rtkaio
libSegFault.so           libcidn-2.17.so  libdl.so.2        libnss_compat-2.17.so  libnss_dns.so.2     libnss_nis-2.17.so     libpthread.so.0         libthread_db-1.0.so
```

Finally, I ran convolutional.py with LD_PRELOAD or LD_LIBRARY_PATH option and those neither helpful. Here is an error message.

```
(tensorflow)[dev-srv /home/user/tensorflow]# LD_PRELOAD=/opt/tensorflow/glibc/lib64/libc.so.6 python ./lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/models/image/mnist/convolutional.py
python: relocation error: /opt/tensorflow/glibc/lib64/libc.so.6: symbol _dl_starting_up, version GLIBC_PRIVATE not defined in file ld-linux-x86-64.so.2 with link time reference

(tensorflow)[dev-srv /home/user/tensorflow]# LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/opt/tensorflow/glibc/lib64 python ./lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/models/image/mnist/convolutional.py
python: relocation error: /opt/tensorflow/glibc/lib64/libc.so.6: symbol _dl_starting_up, version GLIBC_PRIVATE not defined in file ld-linux-x86-64.so.2 with link time reference
```

Does anyone really solve this issue without upgrading OS?
